Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.

I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.

he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They

"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea.

he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.

 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?"

I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.

I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.

"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even watch over th

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this o

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the poe

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend.

I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That woul

he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exc

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.

 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exclaimed.  So a great deal was worked out

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exclaimed.  So a great deal was worked out. I kept the bees safe from harm and the

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exclaimed.  So a great deal was worked out. I kept the bees safe from harm and I w

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exclaimed.  So a great deal was worked out. I kept the bees safe from harm and I was protected from

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exclaimed.  So a great deal was worked out. I kept the bees safe from harm and I was protected from being stung by be

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I am very surprised to hear a bee talk, but nevertheless I asked the bee "What do you mean?"
he bee replied "You are the queen of the bees, and he bees have chosen you to rule over them.
"
I thought this was strange since I'm deathly allergic to bee but I was happy to be queen so I played along.The bee then said "Your first order is to go to the meadow and make a hive."
 I didn't know how to make a hive the way bees do, but I did the best I could.  got asomestick sand leafvesand I made a lhive that looked just like a little house for the bees. "How's that?" I asked the bee when I was finished.I heard the bee say "It's very nice, but you forgot the most important thing."
 
"And what's that?" I asked. And the bee said I need to put it up high in a tree so nothing can harm it. So I climbed a tree and I carefully tied my handcrafted beehive house up in the top of a tree. There, it's safe now.,
 I said to the bee.
The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend.

The next day, I could see hundreds of bees moving into the hive. "They won't sting me will they?" I asked my new friend. "No, you are the queen and they will do anything for you," the bee replied.
 And then I had a great idea. 
"Little bee I have a favor to ask of you," I told my friend. 
"What is that?" asked the friendly bee.
"I am so allergic to a bee sting. I am willing to be your queen and I will even stay and guard the hive if you do me this one thing. Can you make me not allergic to bee stings?"
"I don't think I have the power," said the bee. "But I can travel far and wide and tell all of the bees that you are my queen and that they can never sting you."
"That would be great!", I exclaimed.  So a great deal was worked out. I kept the bees safe from harm and I was protected from being stung by bees again for the rest of my life. T
